name: Love-Zero
description:
This game let every game user to communicate each other. 

Choose a profile name. Next time you restart the game, you will connect to your profile.

Move inside the map, you can zoom in/out. Every heart on the map is a message.  You can create your message, reply or like another one.  

Message

To make a message click the bottom right icon. When you create a message one heart is shown on the map near your location. 

Reply

To make a reply just click on a red heart on map to show it, then write your reply in the window. 

Every reply will draw a line from the original sender location to the replier location. 

Like

Inside message windows you can also like a message clicking on heart icon shown insdie detail window.

The most loved messages draws a red circle halo on the map. 

Build a network of nice vibes all around a world.

Help us to spread some love to all people closed in their homes because of #Covid19.

Enjoy

Why This Name

The name of this project is inspired by the reprodution number factor of deseases.

The basic reproduction number (denoted by R0) is a measure of how transferable a disease is.

see wikipedia: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mathematical_modelling_of_infectious_disease

Update

We originally thought about creating a browser game version for this game to make it accessible to everyone in a simple way, but unfortunately the browser version does not work because of an error with the MapBox library. We are very sad about that. To overcome this problem,  we switched to downloadable builds to let everyone test this game. We successfully tested it on Windows and Mac. Please let us know if you have issues.

Thank you
